00080 void EnterIMPFinish( void )
00081 {
00082 
00083 
00084       // load graphic for portrait
00085       LoadCharacterPortrait( );
00086 
00087       //    CREATE buttons for IMP finish screen
00088   CreateIMPFinishButtons( );
00089   
00090       // set review mode
00091       fReviewStats = TRUE;
00092       iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__FINISH;
00093 
00094       // note that we are in fact done char generation
00095       fFinishedCharGeneration = TRUE;
00096 
00097 
00098       return;
00099 }

00102 {
00103   // the background
00104       RenderProfileBackGround( );

00106       // render merc fullname
00107       RenderCharFullName( );
00108 
00109             // indent for text
00110   RenderBeginIndent( 110, 50 );
00111 
00112       return;
00113 }

00115 void ExitIMPFinish( void )
00116 {
00117

00119   DeleteIMPFinishButtons( );
00120 
00121       // get rid of graphic for portrait
00122       DestroyCharacterPortrait( );

00124       return;
00125 }

00251 
00252 void DeleteIMPFinishButtons( void )
00253 {
00254   // this function destroys the buttons needed for the IMP about Us Page
00255 
00256   // the back  button
00257   RemoveButton(giIMPFinishButton[0] );
00258   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPFinishButtonImage[0] );
00259   
00260       // begin profiling button
00261       RemoveButton(giIMPFinishButton[1] );
00262   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPFinishButtonImage[1] );
00263 
00264       // begin personna button
00265       RemoveButton(giIMPFinishButton[2] );
00266   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPFinishButtonImage[2] );
00267       
00268       // begin attribs button
00269       RemoveButton(giIMPFinishButton[3] );
00270   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPFinishButtonImage[3] );
00271       
00272       // begin portrait button
00273       RemoveButton(giIMPFinishButton[4] );
00274   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPFinishButtonImage[4] );
00275 
00276       // begin voice button
00277       RemoveButton(giIMPFinishButton[5] );
00278   UnloadButtonImage(giIMPFinishButtonImage[5] );
00279 
00280 
00281       return;
00282 }

00284 
00285 void BtnIMPFinishStartOverCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00286 {
00287 
00288       // btn callback for IMP Homepage About US button
00289       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00290             return;
00291 
00292       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00293       {
00294              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00295       }
00296       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00297       {
00298             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00299             {
00300       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00301                   DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_IMP_STYLE, pImpPopUpStrings[ 1 ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_YESNO, FinishMessageBoxCallBack);
00302       
00303             }
00304       }     
00305 } 
00306 
00307 void BtnIMPFinishDoneCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00308 {
00309 
00310       // btn callback for Main Page Begin Profiling
00311 
00312       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00313             return;
00314   
00315       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00316       {
00317              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00318       }
00319       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00320       {
00321             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00322             {
00323       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00324       iCurrentImpPage = IMP_CONFIRM;
00325                   CreateACharacterFromPlayerEnteredStats( );
00326                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00327                   iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__REGISTRY;            
00328                   fFinishedCharGeneration = FALSE;
00329                   //ResetCharacterStats( );
00330             }
00331       }     
00332 } 
00333 
00334 
00335 void BtnIMPFinishPersonalityCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00336 {
00337 
00338       // btn callback for Main Page Begin Profiling
00339   static BOOLEAN fAnimateFlag = FALSE;
00340       static UINT32 uiBaseTime = 0;
00341       static BOOLEAN fState = 0;
00342   INT32 iDifference = 0;
00343   
00344       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00345             return;
00346 
00347       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00348       {
00349              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00350      uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock();
00351              SpecifyButtonText( giIMPFinishButton[2], pImpButtonText[ 23 ] );
00352      fAnimateFlag = TRUE;
00353       }
00354       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00355       {
00356             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00357             {
00358       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00359                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00360                   uiBaseTime = 0;
00361       fAnimateFlag = FALSE;
00362       iCurrentImpPage = IMP_PERSONALITY_QUIZ;
00363                   SpecifyButtonText( giIMPFinishButton[2], pImpButtonText[ 2 ] );
00364             }
00365       }
00366       
00367       // get amount of time between callbacks
00368   iDifference = GetJA2Clock() - uiBaseTime;
00369       
00370       if( fAnimateFlag )
00371       {
00372     if( iDifference > ANIMATE_MIN_TIME )
00373             {
00374                   
00375                   uiBaseTime = GetJA2Clock();
00376                   if( fState )
00377                   {
00378         SpecifyButtonIcon( giIMPFinishButton[2] , guiANALYSE, 1, 33, 23, FALSE );
00379 
00380                         fState = FALSE;
00381                   }
00382                   else
00383                   {
00384         SpecifyButtonIcon( giIMPFinishButton[2] , guiANALYSE, 0, 33, 23, FALSE );
00385 
00386                         fState = TRUE;
00387                   }
00388 
00389             }
00390       }
00391 
00392 
00393 } 
00394 
00395 void BtnIMPFinishAttributesCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00396 {
00397 
00398       // btn callback for Main Page Begin Profiling
00399 
00400       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00401             return;
00402   // if not this far in char generation, don't alot ANY action
00403       if( iCurrentProfileMode < IMP__ATTRIBUTES )
00404       {
00405             btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00406             return;
00407       }
00408 
00409 
00410       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00411       {
00412              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00413       }
00414       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00415       {
00416             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00417             {
00418       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00419       iCurrentImpPage = IMP_ATTRIBUTE_PAGE;
00420                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00421                   SpecifyButtonText( giIMPFinishButton[2], pImpButtonText[ 2 ] );
00422             }
00423       }     
00424 } 
00425 
00426 void BtnIMPFinishPortraitCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00427 {
00428 
00429       // btn callback for Main Page Begin Profiling
00430 
00431       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00432             return;
00433   // if not this far in char generation, don't alot ANY action
00434       if( iCurrentProfileMode < IMP__PORTRAIT )
00435       {
00436             btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00437       
00438             return;
00439       }
00440 
00441 
00442       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00443       {
00444              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00445              sFaceX = 253;
00446              sFaceY = 247;
00447       }
00448       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00449       {
00450             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00451             {
00452       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00453               sFaceX = 253;
00454                   sFaceY = 245;
00455             }
00456       }     
00457 }

00459 
00460 void BtnIMPFinishVoiceCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00461 {
00462 
00463       // btn callback for Main Page Begin Profiling
00464 
00465       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
00466             return;
00467   // if not this far in char generation, don't alot ANY action
00468       if( iCurrentProfileMode < IMP__PORTRAIT )
00469       {
00470             btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00471             fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00472             return;
00473       }
00474 
00475 
00476       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00477       {
00478              btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00479               
00480       }
00481       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00482       {
00483             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00484             {
00485       // play voice
00486                   if( ! SoundIsPlaying( uiVoiceSound ) )
00487                   {
00488         uiVoiceSound = PlayVoice( );
00489                   }     
00490                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00491                   fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00492             }
00493       }     
00494 } 
00495 
00496 BOOLEAN RenderCharProfileFinishFace( void )
00497 {
00498 
00499 // render the portrait of the current picture
00500   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00501       HVOBJECT hHandle;
00502       UINT32 uiGraphicHandle;
00503 
00504   if( fCharacterIsMale == TRUE )
00505       {
00506         switch( LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId )
00507             {
00508               case( 0 ):
00509         // first portrait
00510 
00511                     // load it
00512         VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00513             FilenameForBPP("Faces\\SmallFaces\\00.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00514             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiGraphicHandle));
00515        
00516                     // show it
00517         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiGraphicHandle);
00518         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + sFaceX, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + sFaceY , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00519 
00520 
00521                   // and kick it's sorry ..umm never mind, outta here
00522         DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiGraphicHandle );
00523 
00524               break;
00525       case( 1 ):
00526         // first portrait
00527 
00528                     // load it
00529         VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00530             FilenameForBPP("Faces\\SmallFaces\\01.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00531             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiGraphicHandle));
00532       
00533                     // show it
00534         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiGraphicHandle);
00535         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + sFaceX, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + sFaceY , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00536 
00537 
00538                     // and kick it's sorry ..umm never mind, outta here
00539         DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiGraphicHandle );
00540 
00541               break;
00542               case( 2 ):
00543         // first portrait
00544 
00545                     // load it
00546         VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00547             FilenameForBPP("Faces\\SmallFaces\\02.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00548             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiGraphicHandle));
00549       
00550                   // show it
00551         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiGraphicHandle);
00552         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + sFaceX, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + sFaceY , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00553 
00554 
00555                     // and kick it's sorry ..umm never mind, outta here
00556         DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiGraphicHandle );
00557         
00558 
00559               break;
00560             }
00561       
00562       }
00563       else
00564       {
00565     switch( LaptopSaveInfo.iVoiceId )
00566             {
00567               case( 0 ):
00568         // first portrait
00569 
00570                     // load it
00571         VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00572             FilenameForBPP("Faces\\SmallFaces\\03.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00573             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiGraphicHandle));
00574        
00575                     // show it
00576         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, uiGraphicHandle);
00577         BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 0, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X + sFaceX, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y + sFaceY , VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00578 
00579 
00580                   // and kick it's sorry ..umm never mind, outta here
00581         DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiGraphicHandle );
00582 
00583               break;
00584       case( 1 ):
00585         // first portrait
00586 
00587                     // load it
00588         VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00589             FilenameForBPP("Faces\\SmallFaces\\04.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00590             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiGraphicHandle));
00591       
00592                     // show it

00598         DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiGraphicHandle );
00599 
00600               break;
00601               case( 2 ):
00602         // first portrait
00603 
00604                     // load it
00605         VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00606             FilenameForBPP("Faces\\SmallFaces\\05.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);

00614                     // and kick it's sorry ..umm never mind, outta here
00615         DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( uiGraphicHandle );
00616 
00617               break;
00618             }
00619       }
00620 
00621   // render the nickname
00622   SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00623       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
00624   SetFont( FONT12ARIAL );
00625 
00626       mprintf( 253, 350, pNickName );

00628       return( TRUE );

00630 }

00632 void RenderCharFullName( void )
00633 {
00634 
00635       CHAR16 sString[ 64 ];
00636       INT16 sX, sY;
00637 
00638       // render the characters full name
00639   SetFont( FONT14ARIAL );
00640       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00641       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
00642 
00643       swprintf( sString, pIMPFinishStrings[ 0 ], pFullName );
00644 
00645 
00646   FindFontCenterCoordinates(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X - 111, 0, LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X - LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, 0 , sString , FONT14ARIAL, &sX, &sY);
00647   mprintf( sX, iScreenHeightOffset + LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_DELTA_Y + 33, sString );
00648       return;
00649 }

00652 BOOLEAN LoadCharacterPortrait( void )
00653 {
00654   // this function will load the character's portrait, to be used on portrait button
00655   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00656 
00657       // load it
00658   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00659       FilenameForBPP( pPlayerSelectedFaceFileNames[ iPortraitNumber ] , VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00660       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiCHARACTERPORTRAIT));
00661        
00662       return( TRUE );
00663 }

00666 void DestroyCharacterPortrait( void )
00667 {
00668       // remove the portrait that was loaded by loadcharacterportrait
00669       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiCHARACTERPORTRAIT );
00670 
00671 
00672       return;
00673 }

00675 
00676 void FinishMessageBoxCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
00677 {
00678       // yes, so start over, else stay here and do nothing for now
00679   if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_YES )
00680       {
00681             iCurrentImpPage = IMP_HOME_PAGE;
00682             fButtonPendingFlag = TRUE;
00683             iCurrentProfileMode = IMP__REGISTRY;
00684             fFinishedCharGeneration = FALSE;
00685             ResetCharacterStats( );
00686       }
00687 
00688       if( bExitValue == MSG_BOX_RETURN_NO )
00689       {
00690             MarkButtonsDirty( );
00691       }
00692 
00693       return;
00694 }
